about_the_game:
Why does everything have to be so serious? With the Gag Weapon Set 1, you can equip your characters with silly weapons!

The Gag Weapon Set 1 includes:
・Fishy Hatchet x1 (Mai)
・Laser Gun x1 (Rottie)
・Squeaky Hammer x1 (Liliana)
・Robbit Rapier x1 (Shina)

※You will have to progress the game until you can use weapons.
detailed_description:
Why does everything have to be so serious? With the Gag Weapon Set 1, you can equip your characters with silly weapons!

The Gag Weapon Set 1 includes:
・Fishy Hatchet x1 (Mai)
・Laser Gun x1 (Rottie)
・Squeaky Hammer x1 (Liliana)
・Robbit Rapier x1 (Shina)

※You will have to progress the game until you can use weapons.

name: Death end re;Quest 2 - Gag Weapon Set 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements

short_description: The Gag Weapon Set 1 includes four light hearted weapons to add to your arsenal!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
